Syllabus Templating Tool

This tool facilitates the templating of an initial syllabus draft with digital learning components. The templating process is divided into three stages (prepare, remix, and revise). Please continue the critical work of composing a course after your work with this tool is complete.

prepare

Fill out your course information (all fields optional)

Office: Office Hours: Classroom:

    Syllabuses express cultural choices, values, and philosophies of learning. Please consult these sources as you revise.
  • Jacqueline Wernimont, "Build a Better DH Syllabus."
  • Roopika Risam, "In Defense of Learning Outcomes."
  • Trent Kays, "Email Instruction in First Year Writing Courses."
